channel.title: Upgrading TFS RC to RTM
channel.description: Well, the impending release of Team Foundation Server looks to be days away. The User Education team have posted the upgrade instructions. I'll post back to let folks know how we get on when we do the upgrade. Like many...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Visual Studio Team System User Education Team+00:00
item.description:
Hi Martin,
Let us know how this goes. You might want to download the software update package and review the .doc versions of the files we posted yesterday, as they're easier to read (i.e., more formatting) than the Web versions we could post on our blog.
I believe the data in those fields will be preserved in the SQL DB backup (and therefore should be retrievable after upgrade), but I'll try to get a definitive answer for you.
-=Susan
item.dc:creator: Visual Studio Team System User Education Team
